description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国政治人物，原副国级领导人，有“中国铁娘子”之称。曾任国务院副总理、国务委员、对外贸易经济合作部部长、卫生部部长等职。
description.en: A politician of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, a former Deputy State Leader, known as the "Iron Lady of China." She has served as Vice Premier of the State Council, State Councilor, Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, and Minister of Health.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪毕业的中学。
description.en: The high school from which Wu Yi graduated.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪的母校。

description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, former General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee and President of the PRC.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治人物，曾任日本首相。
description.en: A Japanese politician who served as Prime Minister of Japan.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治家、外交家和退役四星将军，曾任美国国务卿。
description.en: An American politician, diplomat, and retired four-star general who served as the U.S. Secretary of State.

description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who served as a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo and Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部
中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 吴仪于1997年至2002年任中共中央政治局候补委员，2002年至2007年任委员。
description.en: Wu Yi served as an alternate member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee from 1997 to 2002, and as a full member from 2002 to 2007.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院副总理

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国卫生部

relationships.source: 严重急性呼吸系统综合症疫情

description.zh-cn: 因SARS疫情，时任卫生部部长张文康被免职。
description.en: Due to the SARS outbreak, then Minister of Health Zhang Wenkang was dismissed from his post.

relationships.source: 严重急性呼吸系统综合症疫情

description.zh-cn: 因SARS疫情，时任北京市市长孟学农被撤职。
description.en: Due to the SARS outbreak, then Mayor of Beijing Meng Xuenong was removed from his post.

description.zh-cn: 在SARS疫情期间，国家主席胡锦涛发布主席令，任命吴仪兼任卫生部部长。
description.en: During the SARS outbreak, President Hu Jintao issued a presidential decree appointing Wu Yi concurrently as Minister of Health.

position.en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 在温家宝担任国务院总理的内阁中，吴仪出任国务院副总理。
description.en: In the cabinet where Wen Jiabao served as Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi was appointed Vice Premier.

description.zh-cn: 在朱镕基担任国务院总理期间，吴仪是国务委员。
description.en: While Zhu Rongji was Premier of the State Council, Wu Yi served as a State Councilor.

description.zh-cn: 在胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记期间，吴仪是中央政治局委员。
description.en: While Hu Jintao was General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Wu Yi was a member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 在江泽民担任中共中央总书记期间，吴仪是中央政治局候补委员。
description.en: While Jiang Zemin was General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee, Wu Yi was an alternate member of the Politburo.

description.zh-cn: 因小泉纯一郎等日本高官在二战历史问题上发出强硬表态，吴仪在访日期间断然决定取消与小泉的会面。
description.en: Due to strong statements from Japanese high officials including Junichiro Koizumi on WWII history issues, Wu Yi decisively canceled her meeting with Koizumi during her visit to Japan.

description.zh-cn: 根据图片描述，吴仪曾与时任美国国务卿克林·鲍威尔会面。
description.en: According to the image caption, Wu Yi met with then U.S. Secretary of State Colin Powell.

description.zh-cn: 2007年初，时任副总理的黄菊病重，吴仪全面接管了中国的经济和金融工作。
description.en: In early 2007, as then Vice Premier Huang Ju was critically ill, Wu Yi took full charge of China's economic and financial affairs.

relationships.target: 国务院产品质量和食品安全领导小组
国务院防治艾滋病工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 吴仪曾前往河南，和高耀洁询问基层的艾滋病问题。
description.en: Wu Yi traveled to Henan to inquire with Gao Yaojie about grassroots AIDS issues.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪卸任排名第一的国务院副总理后，由李克强接任。
description.en: After Wu Yi stepped down as the first-ranking Vice Premier of the State Council, she was succeeded by Li Keqiang.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪卸任兼任的卫生部部长后，由高强接任。
description.en: After Wu Yi stepped down from her concurrent post as Minister of Health, she was succeeded by Gao Qiang.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪接替李岚清，出任中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部部长。
description.en: Wu Yi succeeded Li Lanqing as the Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 吴仪卸任中华人民共和国对外贸易经济合作部部长后，由石广生接任。
description.en: After Wu Yi stepped down as the Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation, she was succeeded by Shi Guangsheng.
